title: The Forager's Canvas
subtitle: Wild Sourcing
description: We do not design a menu; we interpret the landscape. This season features hand-harvested Venison Tartare with pickled spruce tips, juniper oil, and a dusting of lichen powder. It is the forest floor, reimagined on a ceramic plate.

title: Ember-Roasted Trout
subtitle: Primal Technique
description: Caught at dawn in our glacial lake, cooked at dusk over hard maple embers. The skin is blistered and smoky, the flesh creates a delicate contrast with the fermented gooseberry beurre blanc. A tribute to the primitive art of fire.

title: Subterranean Cellar
subtitle: Bio-Dynamic Pairing
description: Our wine list ignores geography in favor of philosophy. We pour low-intervention vintages that mirror the raw, unpolished beauty of the Canadian Shield. Expect funky skin-contact whites and deep, sediment-rich reds.
